page.title: 07St.Mark's School Binfield
page.content: {St.Marks School}was built in{1906}and has about 100 children ages from 5 to 11 years.The old building has 3 classrooms and there are 2 extra classrooms in the playground.There are 4_5 teachers and a secretary.The school is open 5 days a week from 9am. to 3.15pm each day.There are 3 terms about 14 weeks long,with holidays in between.Most pupils live within 2 km of the school.They walk,cycle or come by car. A typical day starts with assembly followed by maths.After a 20 mins. break we have spelling and English.We have packed lunches.In the afternoon the lessons are projects and craft. Sometimes we have homework.We have 2 computers.We have an Autumn Fayre.We normally raise about Â£1000. The school is scheduled to close in {1987.}
